org.yajasi.JungleJepps.db
Interface DatabaseConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, DataMerge, OperationsDatabase, PrimaryJdbcSource
public interface DatabaseConnection

This interface is used to define a connection to a database for use in Jungle Jepps. It is possible to implement this interface and then modify DatabaseManager class to instantiate it based on appropriate conditions. This modularizes our database connection

Author:
Joel Jeske

close

boolean close()
              throws DatabaseException
Closes the database;

Returns:
True if data base is closed. False if no data base was open
Throws:
